Attacks.Name: Flamethrower
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Quick Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, this character may make a free Move action.

Attacks.Name: Flame Wheel
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Blaze
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 3 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the Strength of its Fire-type attacks by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Flame Cloak
Superpowers.Effect: This character gains immunity to the Burn special condition. Additionally, enemy characters that make melee attacks against this character gain the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Lava Plume
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters (friend and foe) within range 1 of the target character. If a wild is rolled, affected characters also gain the Burn special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Eruption
Superpowers.Effect: All enemy characters within range and line of sight suffer 2 damage. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Typhlosion character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
